dc_title_s: Index of Large Scale Hydrography Surface Water Areas, 2000
dc_description_s: This is an index to Large scale hydrography surface water areas tiled by HUC-8 sub-basin boundaries. Surface water areas extracted from New York State Large Scale Hydrography. Connectors added as needed to create closed areas.  Continuous hydrography areas for mapping and modeling. Base data for creation of high resolution National Hydrography Dataset (NHD).
dc_creator_sm: New York State. Department of Environmental Conservation.
dc_publisher_sm: New York State. Department of Environmental Conservation.
dct_isPartOf_sm: Large Scale Hydrography Surface Water Areas
